article.title: Is safety ‘dead’ at xAI?
article.summary: Elon Musk is “actively” working to make xAI’s Grok chatbot “more unhinged, according to a former employee.

all_candidates.title: Hollywood isn’t happy about the new Seedance 2.0 video generator
all_candidates.summary: Hollywood organizations are pushing back against a new AI video model called Seedance 2.0, which they say has quickly become a tool for “blatant” copyright infringement.

all_candidates.title: Airbnb plans to bake in AI features for search, discovery and support
all_candidates.summary: Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky said the company wants to increase its use of large language models for customer discovery, support and engineering.
